short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jaxcore web browser connectivity extension, enabling client-side Speech Recognition and Motion Control of web games and apps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Jaxcore browser extension enables connectively to the Jaxcore System, a motion and voice control system for the web that uses 100% client-side web technologies, requires no third-party cloud services, no signups, no API keys, is free forever, and most importantly is private and secure with no eavesdropping.  Jaxcore allows web developers to easily add Speech Recognition and Motion Control support to their web games and apps with a small JavaScript library that connects a desktop app service which hosts the software.  Play Voice Chess and other Jaxcore Games, or build your own games with this amazing new Speech and Spin controller support.
